element.name: PListXml2Json
element.short: Converts the parameter list in the specified XML document to it representation using JSON (JavaScript Object Notation).

descr.p: Used in the implementation of the TextMate Grammer parser in the LazEdit package.

element.name: PListXml2Json.Result
element.short: TJSON instance with the content for the XML document.

element.name: PListXml2Json.AnXml
element.short: TXMLDocument with the grammar definitions converted in the routine.
